sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Solicitação de Visitas">6c111d7a97b10110349cf5b3f153af44</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:2d63953e97b10110349cf5b3f153affd</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validar Dada de Início</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (!isLoading) {
        if (newValue != '') {
            //current date
            //Existe a funcao g_user_date_time_format e g_user_date_format
            //
            var currentDateObj = new Date(); //Formato Sun 20 Feb 2022 23:09:01
            var currentDateStr = formatDate(currentDateObj, g_user_date_time_format);
            var currentDateNum = getDateFromFormat(currentDateStr, g_user_date_time_format);



            //get start date
            var startDateStr = g_form.getValue('u_start_date');
            var startDateNum = getDateFromFormat(startDateStr, g_user_date_time_format);



            if (startDateNum <= currentDateNum) {
                //alert('Por gentileza, coloque a data no futuro !.'); //PopUp
                //g_form.showErrorBox('right','Você não pode colocar a data no passado !'); //Caixa de Dialog
                g_form.clearValue('u_start_date');



                //Apresenta Abaixo do Campo no Formulário
                g_form.showFieldMsg('u_start_date', 'Por gentileza, coloque a data no futuro !.', 'error');
                g_form.setValue('u_start_date', '');
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-24 15:19:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>750b5d3697f10110349cf5b3f153afa2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validar Dada de Início</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Visitas" source="x_677506_vst">a52cda86973d0110349cf5b3f153afa8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Visitas">a52cda86973d0110349cf5b3f153afa8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_750b5d3697f10110349cf5b3f153afa2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-24 15:19:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_0f5c91b697f10110349cf5b3f153af76
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Solicitação de Visitas">6c111d7a97b10110349cf5b3f153af44</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1993d93e97b10110349cf5b3f153afaf</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validar Data de Termino</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (!isLoading) {
        if (newValue != '') {
            //current date
            //Existe a funcao g_user_date_time_format e g_user_date_format
            //
            var currentDateObj = new Date(); //Formato Sun 20 Feb 2022 23:09:01
            var currentDateStr = formatDate(currentDateObj, g_user_date_time_format);
            var currentDateNum = getDateFromFormat(currentDateStr, g_user_date_time_format);



            //get start date
            var startDateStr = g_form.getValue('u_start_date');
            var startDateNum = getDateFromFormat(startDateStr, g_user_date_time_format);



            //get end date
            var endDateStr = g_form.getValue('u_end_date');
            var endDateNum = getDateFromFormat(endDateStr, g_user_date_time_format);



            if (endDateNum <= currentDateNum) {
                //alert('Por gentileza, coloque a data no futuro !.'); //PopUp
                //g_form.showErrorBox('right','Você não pode colocar a data no passado !'); //Caixa de Dialog
                g_form.clearValue('u_end_date');



                //Apresenta Abaixo do Campo no Formulário
                g_form.showFieldMsg('u_end_date', 'Por gentileza, coloque a data no futuro !.', 'error');
                g_form.setValue('u_end_date', '');
            }



            if (endDateNum <= startDateNum) {
                //alert('Por gentileza, coloque a data no futuro !.'); //PopUp
                // g_form.showErrorBox('right','Você não pode colocar a data no passado !'); //Caixa de Dialog
                g_form.clearValue('u_end_date');



                //Apresenta Abaixo do Campo no Formulário
                g_form.showFieldMsg('u_end_date', 'Por gentileza, a data de saída deve ser maior que a data de entrada !.', 'error');
                g_form.setValue('u_end_date', '');
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-24 15:20:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f5c91b697f10110349cf5b3f153af76</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validar Data de Termino</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Visitas" source="x_677506_vst">a52cda86973d0110349cf5b3f153afa8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Visitas">a52cda86973d0110349cf5b3f153afa8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0f5c91b697f10110349cf5b3f153af76</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-24 15:20:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
